columns.blockSubtitle: Justia’s Stacy Stern is Now a Harvard Expert in Residence
description: We are proud to announce that our president, Stacy Stern, recently became an Expert in Residence with Harvard Innovation Labs. This program supports Harvard innovators, both students and alumni, by connecting them with entrepreneurs and business leaders who can help guide them as they explore their own journeys in the business world.
Now that spring has sprung, Sheba can’t resist spending time outside with her peeps. What pug or human could possibly resist this beautiful Saturday sunshine?
